AI Description: R-RNAseq is an R package for the analysis of RNA sequencing data. It provides a comprehensive set of tools for preprocessing, quality assessment, differential expression analysis, and visualization of RNA sequencing data.
Core Features: Preprocessing Of RNA Sequencing Data, Quality Assessment Of Sequencing Data, Differential Expression Analysis, Visualization Of RNA Sequencing Results
General Tags: RNA Sequencing, Bioinformatics, Data Analysis, Statistical Analysis
